text.0: great power is in the beam of light sing praise to agni to the god.
text.1: whom men have set in foremost place like mitra with their eulogies.
text.2: he by the splendour of his arms is priest of every able man.
text.3: agni conveys oblation straight and deals as bhaga deals his boons.
text.4: all rests upon the laud and love of him the rich highflaming god.
text.5: on whom loudroaring men have laid great strength as on a faithful friend.
text.6: so agni be the friend of these with liberal gift of hero strength.
text.7: yea heaven and earth have not surpassed this youthful one in glorious fame.
text.8: o agni quickly come to us and glorified bring precious wealth.
text.9: so we and these our princes will assemble for the good of all be near in fight to prosper us.
